thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com
thread.title: Karie Schaefer
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Karie Schaefer

author: Karie Schaefer
title: Karie Schaefer
text: My fiance and I weren't sure where to begin when it came to booking blocks of rooms at nearby hotels. The fact that Skipper is FREE made it so easy to explore different options, prices, amenities. Not to mention our Skipper Booking Advisor, Rob was very friendly and super helpful. His response time to my questions was so fast. This tool is convenient and fun to use. Highly recommended for those who don't have a lot of time to contact hotels during business hours, etc.
